naslov: Vila  pogledom na more na južnoj strani otoka Čiovo ! (prodaja)
opis: Vila  pogledom na more na južnoj strani otoka Čiovo ! Vila je smještena u naseljenom južnom dijelu otoka u gdje dominiraju kuće i vile sa lijepim vrtovima i uređenim okućnicama. U mirnoj  ulici ,slijepoj i kratkoj ulici na povišenom blago kosom terenu.Do mora i plaže je oko 200 metara . Sa sjeverne strane vile je parking i natkriveni  roštilj sa prostorom za posluživanje.Istočna strana kuće izlazi na pristupnu ulicu te osim vrtnog dijela ima takođe parking te ulaz u garažu.Južna i zapadna strana okućnice je u naravi pažljivo osmišljen ,prostrani vrt, sa puno zelenila i mediteranskog bilja. Vila je luksuzno opremljena i namještena. Nudi udobnost i komfor. U svim prostorijama su  klime i centralno grijanje Ima solarnu elektranu te dva sustava centralnog grijanja Kvalitetna unutarnja i vanjska stolarija te vanjsko ostakljenje za optimalno korištenje sunčeve svjetlosti. Ukupna površina okućnice je 850,00 m. Vila se može prodati po stanovima sa cijenom na upit -za svaki stan. Površina vile:452,83 m2 Cijena :1 150 000 eura Čine je: Podrum: - ulazni prostor (3 m²) i unutarnje skale (13 m²) koje vode do prizemlja vile - ostava (6 m²) - jedna prostorija namijenjena  za skladištenje - druga prostorija je strojarnica  (centralno grijanje, sustav za kišnicu i solarno grijanje) - prostrana garaža -25m2, sa vratima na daljinsko upravljanje Prizemlje: -   veliki luksuzan stan S.1 (150,92 m²) s hodnikom, blagovaonom ,kuhinjom, dvije  spavaće sobe,dvije kupaone i garderoba - dvije natkrivene terase na južnoj strani stana : jedna (19,09 m² i druga 18,50 m²)  sa lijepim pogledom na more - unutarnje stubište je  (13 m²) Prvi kat: - u naravi dva zrcalno okrenuta stana južne orijentacije , stan S.2  površine (60,28 m²): kuhinja sa  blagovaonom i dnevnim boravkom, prostrana spavaća soba, kupaona, prostrana terasa s nenatkrivenim dijelom (7,73 m2) i natkrivenim dijelom (9,95 m²) - stan S.3 površine (50,38 m²): kuhinja sa  blagovaonom i dnevnim boravkom, prostrana spavaća soba, kupaona, hodnik, natkrivena prostrana terasa(17,98 m²) - unutarnje stubište (13 m²) Kontakt: +385 (0)99 244 6688  Milorad Lučić m.lucic@remax.hr Želite li posjetiti ovu nekretninu ili imate bilo kakvih pitanja? Kontaktirajte nas,rado ćemo Vam pomoći. Vaš Remax tim u Trogiru (Hrvatska). Villa with sea view on the south side of the island of Čiovo! The villa is located in the populated southern part of the island, dominated by houses and villas with beautiful gardens and landscaped courtyards. In a quiet, dead-end and short street on an elevated, slightly sloping terrain. The sea and the beach are about 200 meters away. On the north side of the villa there is a parking lot and a covered barbecue with a serving area. The east side of the house opens onto the access street and, in addition to the garden area, there is also a parking lot and an entrance to the garage. The south and west sides of the courtyard are in nature a carefully designed, spacious garden, with lots of greenery and Mediterranean plants. The villa is luxuriously equipped and furnished. It offers comfort and convenience. All rooms have air conditioning and central heating It has a solar power plant and two central heating systems Quality interior and exterior joinery and exterior glazing for optimal use of sunlight. The total area of the courtyard is 850.00 m. The villa can be sold by apartments with a price on request - for each apartment. Villa area: 452.83 m2 Price: 1,150,000 euros It consists of: Basement: - entrance area (3 m²) and internal stairs (13 m²) leading to the ground floor of the villa - storage room (6 m²) - one room intended for storage - the second room is the engine room (central heating, rainwater system and solar heating) - spacious garage -25m2, with remote control door Ground floor: - large luxurious apartment S.1 (150.92 m²) with hallway, dining room, kitchen, two bedrooms, two bathrooms and wardrobe - two covered terraces on the south side of the apartment: one (19.09 m² and the other 18.50 m²) with a beautiful sea view - internal staircase (13 m²) First floor: - essentially two mirror-facing apartments facing south, apartment S.2 area (60.28 m²): kitchen with dining room and living room, spacious bedroom, bathroom, spacious terrace with uncovered part (7.73 m2) and covered part (9.95 m²) - apartment S.3 area (50.38 m²): kitchen with dining area and living room, spacious bedroom, bathroom, hallway, spacious covered terrace (17.98 m²) - internal staircase (13 m²) Contact: +385 (0)99 244 6688 Milorad Lučić m.lucic@remax.hr Would you like to visit this property or do you have any questions? Contact us, we will be happy to help you. Your Remax team in Trogir (Croatia).
